title: The Batman

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey and fellow film critic Emily Wheeler discuss The Batman. He then chats with Heartland Film's Greg Sorvig about the film legacy of producer Alan Ladd, Jr.
